biotools.summary: MIXMUL (Mixture of Weighted Multinomial) procedure is a convenient haplotype inference tool for mixed data to estimate haplotype frequencies accurately and output the most likely reconstructed haplotype pairs of each subject in the estimation.

bioschemas.name: MIXMUL
bioschemas.summary: MIXMUL (Mixture of Weighted Multinomial) procedure is a convenient haplotype inference tool for mixed data to estimate haplotype frequencies accurately and output the most likely reconstructed haplotype pairs of each subject in the estimation.
